translation.text: Please allow extra travel time due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Toongabbie earlier. A reduced service is currently in operation. You may need to join a service to Granville and change to complete your journey. For the latest updates please check transport apps, indicator screens and listen to announcements.

Trains have been suspended between Wollongong and Port Kembla & replaced by buses due to heavy rainfall causing flooding at Port Kembla. Delays are also being experienced to train services in both directions between Coalcliff & Helensburgh due to heavy rain activating track safety monitors. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check indicator screens & transport apps for service updates.

Allow 30 minutes additional travel time towards the City to some services due to signal equipment repairs at Woy Woy earlier. Please check Transport Apps, information screens and listen to announcements for updates.

Train services have been suspended on the Hunter Line and replaced by buses in both directions between Newcastle Interchange to Scone/Dungog due to flooding between Sandgate and Warabrook.  Please allow additional travel time, check station indicator screens, listen for announcements and refer to real time apps for updates. Customers may also utilise local bus routes as an alternative or make their own arrangements.
due to heavy rainfall activating track safety monitors between Coalcliff & Helensburgh.
There is no access to the fourth carriage of this service due to a medical emergency earlier. Please board adjacent carriages.

North Sydney due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please allow additional travel time, check Transport Apps, information screens and listen to announcements for next service information.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Toongabbie earlier. You may need to join a service to Granville and change to complete your journey. Please allow extra travel time.
Delayed up to 20 minutes due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Newcastle Interchange earlier. Please allow additional travel time.

Wollongong Due to heavy rainfall at Port Kembla causing flooding. Buses replace trains between Wollongong & Port Kembla in both directions until train services can resume.Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check indicator screens & real time apps for service updates.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Liverpool
due to level crossing repairs at Riverstone earlier and a train requiring mechanical repairs at Toongabbie earlier.
due to signal equipment repairs at Woy Woy earlier. Please allow additional travel time.
due to signal equipment repairs. Frequent service are operating on the T1 Western Line.
Glenfield, Campbelltown, Macarthur due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Liverpool

Wollongong Due to heavy rainfall at Port Kembla causing flooding. Buses replace trains between Wollongong & Port Kembla in both directions until train services can resume.Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check indicator screens & real time apps for service updates.
North Strathfield, Concord West, Meadowbank, Denistone due to an operational issue earlier

Central This train will commence from Central due to heavy rainfall activating track safety monitors between Coalcliff & Helensburgh earlier . If you were planning to board this service from ESR stations Bondi Junction to Town Hall please board the 07:56 Bondi Junction to Sutherland service and change at Wolli Creek to connect with your South Coast train service.
Waverton, Wollstonecraft, Artarmon, Roseville due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Toongabbie earlier.
due to heavy rainfall activating track safety monitors between Coalcliff & Helensburgh.

North Sydney due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please allow additional travel time, check Transport Apps, information screens and listen to announcements for next service information.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please allow additional travel time.
Blacktown due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Toongabbie earlier. You may need to join a service to Granville and change to complete your journey. Please allow extra travel time.

Until Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9847 8458.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and Platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 0298517204.
The lift between the car park and bus terminal is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7462.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9602 8060.
The lift between the concourse and platform 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.
The lift between the concourse and Morts Road and Pitt Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9579 4010.
The lift between the concourse and Denham Avenue is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9522 1265.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the footbridge is closed for upgrade work until 22 September 2020. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 4349 9110.
The lift between platform 1 and Railway Pde is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5576.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.
The lift between the concourse and North Parade is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9625 8156.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9625 8156.
The Southern Tunnel is currently closed due to flooding. Please use the Inner Tunnel for access to Platforms 16 to 23 or travel via the Northern Concourse for access to Platforms 1 to 12.

There are changes to Platforms 18 and 19 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.   Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform.  Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From 12am Saturday 1 August to 4am Monday 3 August: the stairs, escalators and lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.  For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From Saturday 25 July to Sunday 9 August: the Suburban Tunnel will be temporarily closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Access for Platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel during this period. You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/media/4930/central-station-map.pdf.

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From Wednesday 10 June to Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.

During the current upgrade of Mittagong Station access points to the station have changed.  Entry/exit to the station via Regent St is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the station building.  Entry/exit to the station via Railway Pde is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the shelter on the platform. Please allow additional time to access the station as a reduced number of parking spaces are available during the upgrade.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
